title: Tim Cook expands John Ternus’ role to oversee Apple design strategy: Report
snippet: Apple has reportedly appointed John Ternus as the executive overseer of its design organisation, expanding his role in hardware and software design strategy.&nbsp;

title: Apple’s MacBook Pro could get OLED screen and touchscreen in 2026 overhaul
snippet: Apple is expected to unveil a redesigned MacBook Pro later this year, with reports pointing to a slimmer chassis, OLED display technology and possible touchscreen support, marking the first major update to the professional laptop line in nearly five years.

title: TikTok down in the United States? Hundreds of users flag glitch - Current status here
snippet: TikTok is experiencing significant issues in the US, with thousands of users reporting outages on Sunday, according to DownDetector. Here's everything you need to know about the reported outage.

title: iQOO 15 Ultra tipped to bring capacitive shoulder triggers for gamers
snippet: The iQOO 15 Ultra is set to launch next month as a premium gaming-focused flagship. It is expected to feature capacitive shoulder triggers, haptic feedback, dual control chips and high AnTuTu scores, promising low-latency performance for mobile gamers.

title: In a first, security forces will use AI-enabled smart glasses on Republic Day 2026 - How does this work?
snippet: Delhi Police will deploy AI-enabled smart glasses for the first time during the 77th Republic Day Parade 2026. The move is aimed at enhancing threat detection with facial recognition and thermal imaging linked that will be linked to a real-time criminal database.

title: Is Wikipedia dead? OpenAI's GPT-5.2 turns to Elon Musk's Grokipedia for real-time answers
snippet: OpenAI's GPT-5.2 was caught turning to Elon Musk's Grokipedia for real time answers, according to a latest report. The news comes at a time when Musk and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman have been fighting it out on social media.

title: Redmi Note 15 Pro launching in India on 29 October: Pre-order details, specs, expected price and more
snippet: Xiaomi's Redmi Note 15 Pro+ will launch in India on January 29, with pre-bookings now open on Amazon. The device features a 6.83-inch OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra processor, 200MP camera, and a 6,500mAh battery, with pre-booking priced at  ₹1,990.

snippet: Famed artificial intelligence researcher Richard Socher is in talks to raise hundreds of millions of dollars for a new startup called Recursive that’s focused on building more advanced AI systems. The financing would value Recursive at roughly $4 billion.

title: Twist and turns at AI startup Thinking Machines keep Valley on the edge
snippet: Internal conflict at Thinking Machines saw founders defect to OpenAI after disputes prompting firings, rehiring by Sam Altman, highlighting AI industry rivalry.

title: D2C brands see Republic Day sales momentum continuing on ecommerce
snippet: Direct-to-consumer brands saw higher sales during the week-long Republic Day sale, driven by discounts, the wedding season and festivals like Makar Sankranti. title: Everyone wants AI sovereignty. No one can truly have it.
